column1: M.Sc. New Mobility - Micromobility in Stade
column5: New Mobility - MicromobilityMaster of Science (M.Sc.)For you, deciding between car, bus or train is ancient history? Are you interested in sustainable ways of getting around? The Master's study programme New Mobility - Micromibility provides a study programme in a growing and future-oriented subject area.
